entry.title: Friday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 13. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries early this evening. Clearing this evening. Wind northwest 20 km/h becoming light early this evening. Low minus 13. Wind chill minus 11 this evening and minus 18 overnight. Forecast issued 3:49 PM EST Friday 17 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Mainly cloudy. High plus 1.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Becoming cloudy late in the morning. Wind becoming southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 in the morning. High plus 1. Wind chill minus 17 in the morning. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 3:49 PM EST Friday 17 February 2023
